    %% L++ State Diagram: L++ Event Sequence Simulator
    [HealthTech_PatientRecords] --> idle
    idle --> ready : LOAD [HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
    ready --> ready : LOAD
    simulating --> ready : LOAD
    ready --> simulating : START [HealthTech_PatientRecords]
    simulating --> simulating : DISPATCH
    simulating --> simulating : SET_CONTEXT
    simulating --> simulating : REFRESH
    simulating --> simulating : EVAL_GATES
    simulating --> simulating : FORK
    simulating --> simulating : SWITCH_FORK [HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
    simulating --> simulating : STEP_BACK [HealthTech_PatientRecords]
    simulating --> simulating : SET_SEQUENCE
    simulating --> simulating : RUN_SEQUENCE [HealthTech_PatientRecords]
    simulating --> simulating : FUZZ
    simulating --> simulating : FIND_PATH
    simulating --> simulating : EXPLORE
    simulating --> simulating : VIEW_TRACE
    simulating --> simulating : VIEW_SPACE [HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
    simulating --> simulating : EXPORT [HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
    simulating --> simulating : IMPORT [HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
    simulating --> simulating : RESET
    simulating --> ready : STOP
    ready --> idle : UNLOAD
    simulating --> idle : UNLOAD
repo_description: L++ is not a programming language. It is a language-agnostic Logic Frame designed to execute business processes defined in purely symbolic, declarative blueprints.
